whoWeAre.title: Outcome-driven, safely delivered
whoWeAre.body: Embuscon is an engineering-led consultancy that modernizes legacy systems, harness data, and deploys responsible AI — pairing product thinking with hands-on delivery for fast, safe results.

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.body: We partner across Legacy Modernization & Cloud Migration, Program & Delivery Management, Agentic AI MVPs, Advisory & GTM, Software Development & Testing, and Contract & Legal Consulting. From platform builds and integrations to guardrailed AI agents, we deliver outcomes you can measure.
